Product Description

BUNDLE OF FEATURES: 19 inch flat screen TV has potential features for you to not settle for less. HDMI、VGA and USB inputs are connected with external audio and video playback. AV input is there to use with DVD players or Game Systems. Built in speaker for party while Headphone Jack is for private viewing.
ENDLESS CONNECTIVITY: Computer,DVR,Apple TV, Amazon Firestick, Roku, Slingbox, Chromecast, WIFI Box ,DVD players and of course gaming consoles. You can also connect your monitor to the computer host that will allow you to use your TV as a computer monitor.
SUITABLE FOR HOME & RV TV: Wall-mountable TV is designed specifically to make your small and compact area in the house quite useful. You can enjoy watching your favorite shows and a lot more without worrying of putting this under cabinet tv at a special dedicated place. This portable tv is enough to be a good companion of yours, while you’re on the go in a truck, on RV camping or even if you have a tight kitchen and bedroom space for your tv.
UNIQUE REMOTE CONTROL:Control your TV with one remote control with clear every button function, very easy to use.(Note: Because the remote control code is different，19‘’ Televison is not compatible with Xfinity/Direct tv/Comcast /Verizon remotes ,require user to use two remote controls to operate tv.)
